title: Error installing on macOS Sierra
body:
I was trying to `./bin/spack install python` on my macOS Sierra (10.12.6), and after resolving #6010, I'm now seeing a different issue, this time with bzip2:

```bash
$ ./bin/spack install python
==> Installing bzip2
==> Using cached archive: /Users/lee1001/projs/llnl/spack/var/spack/cache/bzip2/bzip2-1.0.6.tar.gz
==> Already staged bzip2-1.0.6-dspzezlf3hhea4busq6pqyqkpba67vzg in /Users/lee1001/projs/llnl/spack/var/spack/stage/bzip2-1.0.6-dspzezlf3hhea4busq6pqyqkpba67vzg
==> Already patched bzip2
==> Building bzip2 [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8' '-f' 'Makefile-libbz2_so'

8 errors found in build log:
     [ ... ]
     11    huffman.c22:
     12    :
     13    In file included from bzlib.cblocksort.c::2222:
     14    :
     15    :crctable.c31:
     16    :22:
  >> 17    ./bzlib_private.h:25:10: fatal error: ./bzlib_private.h:25./bzlib_private.h./bzlib_private.h::./bzlib_private.h::./bzlib_private.h./bzlib_private.h::25251025::10::25 :fatal error2510:'stdlib.h' file not found10
     18    ::  fatal errorfatal error:: : 1010::  fatal errorfatal error: : : 'stdlib.h' file not found 'stdlib.h' file not foundfatal error
     19    : 'stdlib.h' file not found
     20
     21    'stdlib.h' file not found
     22    'stdlib.h' file not found
     23    'stdlib.h' file not found
     [ ... ]
     38    1 error generated.
     39    1 error generated.
     40    1 error generated.
     41    1 error generated.
     42    1 error generated.
     43    1 error generated.
  >> 44    make: *** [randtable.o] Error 1
     45    make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
  >> 46    make: *** [crctable.o] Error 1
  >> 47    make: *** [huffman.o] Error 1
  >> 48    make: *** [blocksort.o] Error 1
  >> 49    make: *** [decompress.o] Error 1
  >> 50    make: *** [compress.o] Error 1
     51    1 error generated.
  >> 52    make: *** [bzlib.o] Error 1

See build log for details:
  /Users/lee1001/projs/llnl/spack/var/spack/stage/bzip2-1.0.6-dspzezlf3hhea4busq6pqyqkpba67vzg/bzip2-1.0.6/spack-build.out
```

the full log is:

```bash

==> 'make' '-j8' '-f' 'Makefile-libbz2_so'
```
